      OpenClaw Guide

      Chat. Install. Document. Generate complete docs using the OpenClaw Telegram bot.

      Method 1: Via Telegram Bot (Recommended)

      Chat with your OpenClaw bot on Telegram:

      You: Install the doc-kit skill from GitHub

      üêæ OpenClaw: Cloning doc-kit... ‚úÖ Skill installed successfully! 11 AI sub-skills loaded. Type "help doc-kit" to see available commands.

      Method 2: One-Command Install

      SSH into your VPS and run:

      openclaw skills install relukdev/doc-kit

      Generate Docs via Telegram

      Generate complete documentation just by chatting:

      You: Generate full docs for my project ‚Äî all types, astro format

      üêæ OpenClaw: Running DocKit Master...

      ‚úÖ Analyzing codebase: 127 files, 3 frameworks detected
      ‚úÖ Generated: Personas, JTBD, Process Flows
      ‚úÖ Generated: Architecture, Database, Deployment docs
      ‚úÖ Generated: SOP guides + API reference
      ‚úÖ Astro Starlight site ready at ./astro-site/

      üé® Create Design System + Code

      Combine DocKit Master with UX Master for the ultimate workflow:

      You: Now create a design system from the Linear app

      üêæ OpenClaw: Running UX Master Harvester...

      ‚úÖ Extracted 127 tokens: 24 colors, 8 fonts, 12 spacing scales
      ‚úÖ Generated: design-system.css, design-system.json

      ZeroClaw Guide

      Rust-Native speed for local-first documentation generation.

      ‚ö° Quick Install

      ZeroClaw uses the standard agentskills.io format. DocKit Master is fully compatible:

      # Clone DocKit Master
git clone https://github.com/relukdev/doc-kit.git ~/skills/doc-kit

# Tell ZeroClaw about it
zeroclaw skills add ~/skills/doc-kit

      Verify Installation

      # Check skill is loaded
zeroclaw skills list

# Expected output:
# doc-kit    v1.0.0    11 AI sub-skills, 5 doc types, SEO + LLM optimization
